page.title: 15Sport in Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: There are various sports which take place in the three schools.Also many sports are open to the public.Here are most of them:there is a tennis club for all ages situated on Finkle Hill,a bowling club which is next to the tennis club, this is for all ages over ten.Sherburn-in- Elmet has the White Rose Football Club which plays on the Recreation Ground.There is also rugby for adults based at Eversley Park.The Sherburn-in-Elmet Angling Club is based at the Bacon Factory Pond.On the outskirts of the village there is a squash club and cricket is played on a field in the centre of the village.There are two badminton clubs for adults and a judo club which takes place in the Village Centre.Two "Fun Runs"take place annually.
